posts.title: Unlocking the Record of American Creativity—with Your Help
posts.text: NYPL is embarking on a project to extract data contained in the Catalog of Copyright Entries in order to create a database for copyright research.

posts.title: How We Expand Access to Our Public Domain
posts.text: Learn how the work of the Copyright and Information Policy team contributed to the recent public domain release, and continues to expand access to our collections.
